original_title: Baby Babble 2 - First Words: P B M
overview: Baby Babble 2 First Words: P B M is the second video in the award winning Baby Babble series. Baby Babble 2 introduces some of the first developmental sounds: P, B & M using simple sign language, amusing facial exercises, and beginning speech sounds and words. Included is a parent tutorial designed by pediatric speech therapists.
title: Baby Babble 2 - First Words: P B M
